metadata.title: Professional CPM Calculator | Calculate Cost Per Mille | CPM Calculator
metadata.description: Free CPM Calculator for digital marketing campaigns. Calculate Cost Per Mille, impressions, and advertising costs easily. Essential tool for marketers and advertisers.

ai_workstation.title: AI Workstation
ai_workstation.description: Use artificial intelligence technology for image editing, restoration, and generation. Upload images and describe the effects you want, and AI will create amazing results for you.

image_upload.title: Image (Optional)

image_upload.file_types: PNG, JPG, JPEG or WEBP (max 10MB each)

prompt.title: Prompt

count.description: Select how many images to generate

results.title: Results
results.description: The modified image results will appear here.
results.before_after_tip: Drag the center line to compare Before/After

errors.no_prompt_or_image: Please upload an image or enter a prompt to generate results.
errors.insufficient_credits_detailed: Insufficient credits or loading failed, {credits} credits required to generate images. Please refresh credits or recharge first.

errors.network_error: Network error, please try again later

component_one.title: Calculate CPM Like a Pro
component_one.description: The ultimate CPM calculator for digital marketers and advertisers.
component_one.subdescription: Calculate Cost Per Mille, plan budgets, and optimize your advertising campaigns with precision.

control_panel.description: Enter your campaign data to calculate CPM and other metrics
control_panel.prompt_description: Describe what you want to change in the image
control_panel.prompt_placeholder: Example: Change the background to a blue sky
control_panel.aspect_ratio_description: Choose the aspect ratio you want to use
control_panel.output_count_description: Choose the number of outputs you want

chat.title: SuperMaker AI Assistant
chat.subtitle: Intelligent Conversations with Advanced AI Technology
chat.description: Experience next-generation AI conversations. Get creative assistance, technical guidance, and innovative solutions through our advanced AI chat interface.
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about your creative projects...

veo.title: Veo 3 AI Video Generator
veo.subtitle: Create Professional Videos with Google's Latest AI Model
veo.description: Generate stunning, high-quality videos using Google's breakthrough Veo 3 model. Transform your ideas into cinematic masterpieces with unprecedented realism.
veo.placeholder: Describe the video you want to create with Veo 3...

gemini.title: Gemini Flash Image Generator
gemini.subtitle: Lightning-Fast Image Creation with Google's Gemini
gemini.description: Create, edit, and enhance images at blazing speed with Gemini Flash. Experience the perfect blend of quality and speed in AI image generation.
gemini.placeholder: Describe the image you want to generate with Gemini Flash...

text_video.title: AI Text-to-Video Generator
text_video.subtitle: Transform Words into Cinematic Experiences
text_video.description: Convert your written ideas into compelling video content. Our advanced AI understands context and creates videos that perfectly match your vision.
text_video.placeholder: Write a story or scene you want to turn into a video...

image_video.title: AI Image-to-Video Generator
image_video.subtitle: Bring Static Images to Life with Motion
image_video.description: Animate your images with realistic motion and effects. Transform still photographs into dynamic video content with intelligent movement prediction.
image_video.placeholder: Describe how you want your image to move and animate...

text_image.title: AI Text-to-Image Generator
text_image.subtitle: Create Stunning Visuals from Text Descriptions
text_image.description: Generate beautiful, high-resolution images from simple text prompts. From photorealistic scenes to artistic illustrations, bring your imagination to life.
text_image.placeholder: Describe the image you want to create in detail...

image_image.title: AI Image-to-Image Generator
image_image.subtitle: Transform and Enhance Your Images with AI
image_image.description: Edit, transform, and enhance existing images using advanced AI. Change styles, modify content, or completely reimagine your visual assets.
image_image.placeholder: Describe how you want to transform your image...

text_music.title: AI Music Generator
text_music.subtitle: Compose Original Music from Text Descriptions
text_music.description: Create custom soundtracks, melodies, and complete musical compositions. From ambient soundscapes to full orchestral pieces, compose with AI.
text_music.placeholder: Describe the music style, mood, and instruments you want...

text_speech.title: AI Voice Generator
text_speech.subtitle: Natural-Sounding Voice Synthesis from Text
text_speech.description: Convert text into lifelike speech with emotion and expression. Choose from various voices and languages for narration, dialogue, and voiceovers.
text_speech.placeholder: Enter the text you want to convert to natural speech...
